Class GradeTest

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container

                      proj2.GradeTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class GradeTest
extends javax.swing.JFrame

Allows an administrator to grade a test by loading up the answer key and a file that contains answers from a student's test. The module keeps track of questions and points earned as well as points possible. The administrator can change the number of points awarded at any time, but multiple choice and fill in the blank type questions are automatically scored for correctness.

Author:
mark
See Also:
Serialized Form
